channel.title: EASY free $5 amazon gift cards and more! (no cc or paypal required)
channel.description:
PROOF = at this link http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/8195/clipboard01rr9.jpg
1. Go to http://www.winzy.com/runemissle (would appreciate it) or just http://www.winzy.com/ 2. Sign up. 3. Go to http://account.winzy.com/upgrade/ and add winzy to the search bar, all it does is add's winzy as a search engine that you can search from anywhere in the little search box at the top right of firefox... doesn't add toolbars or shit like that. 4. Do a search from the little search bar that it just installed, you only need to do it once to upgrade your account to gold star and then you get 2x the points for every search (goes faster). 5. Go back to winzy.com and in the main search box (we're completely done with the search in the top right of firefox) and search for something (hermaphrodites, etc) 6. Run either: Firefox’s “ReloadEvery” https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/115 ----------or------------- IE “AutoRefresher” http://www.download.com/AutoRefresher-for-IE/3000-12777_4-10062693.html?tag=lst-1 7. PROFIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Winzy is just an Ask.com search engine that lets you collect up gay raffle points for a $100,000 lottery at the end of the month. Fuck that I said.
But zomg! Turns out they give out Amazon gift certificates like candy. (Maybe like 1-3 an hour.) Also iPods (rare item). The site is beta right now and they haven’t heard of Fire-fail yet. Run your refresher for a while and check back to see what you won. Everything you win when your under me, i win as well, so you win an ipod, i win an ipod, you win 100 points, i win 100 points as well.
Apparently they kind of caught on... don't know what the fuck happened to it though, i got a message a couple days ago saying i had done the same search query to many times and to do a new query, haven't gotten it again, just change what ever your "searching" for from day to day, it doesn't look like it blocks it before you can get all your daily points. I have still been getting all my points without any problem, i had just been searching the same query for about 3-4 days straight which is why i got that message.
ADDED: Find cheap shit easily to buy with your gift certificates you win (Everything on the website is 70% discounted or MORE. http://www.junglecrazy.com/
Another ADDED: Added Dkk's winzy cheater app, here's what he's got to say about it.
QUOTE As of right now, it only does random web searching using a 2000+ wordlist. It'll keep searching until you win a chance at a game. Also, it's able to minimize into the systemtray. As stated before, I may update it so that it's much better, but we'll see. Check the ReadMe.txt for details.
Screenshots:
http://www.darkknighth20.com/downloads/winzycheater/winzycheaterb.jpg
http://www.darkknighth20.com/downloads/winzycheater/winzycheater2b.jpg
Download: http://rapidshare.com/files/86153059/winzycheater.zip.html

item.title: EASY free $5 amazon gift cards and more! (no cc or paypal required)
item.dc:creator: @runemissle runemissle
item.description:
@runemissle wrote:

PROOF = at this link http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/8195/clipboard01rr9.jpg

  1. Go to http://www.winzy.com/runemissle (would appreciate it) or just http://www.winzy.com/
  2. Sign up.
  3. Go to http://account.winzy.com/upgrade/ and add winzy to the search bar, all it does is add’s winzy as a search engine that you can search from anywhere in the little search box at the top right of firefox… doesn’t add toolbars or shit like that.
  4. Do a search from the little search bar that it just installed, you only need to do it once to upgrade your account to gold star and then you get 2x the points for every search (goes faster).
  5. Go back to winzy.com and in the main search box (we’re completely done with the search in the top right of firefox) and search for something (hermaphrodites, etc)
  6. Run either:
    Firefox’s “ReloadEvery”
    https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/115
    ----------or-------------
    IE “AutoRefresher”
    http://www.download.com/AutoRefresher-for-IE/3000-12777_4-10062693.html?tag=lst-1
  7. PROFIT!!!

Winzy is just an Ask.com search engine that lets you collect up gay raffle points for a $100,000 lottery at the end of the month. Fuck that I said.

But zomg! Turns out they give out Amazon gift certificates like candy. (Maybe like 1-3 an hour.) Also iPods (rare item). The site is beta right now and they haven’t heard of Fire-fail yet. Run your refresher for a while and check back to see what you won. Everything you win when your under me, i win as well, so you win an ipod, i win an ipod, you win 100 points, i win 100 points as well.

Apparently they kind of caught on… don’t know what the fuck happened to it though, i got a message a couple days ago saying i had done the same search query to many times and to do a new query, haven’t gotten it again, just change what ever your “searching” for from day to day, it doesn’t look like it blocks it before you can get all your daily points. I have still been getting all my points without any problem, i had just been searching the same query for about 3-4 days straight which is why i got that message.

ADDED:
Find cheap shit easily to buy with your gift certificates you win (Everything on the website is 70% discounted or MORE.
http://www.junglecrazy.com/

Another ADDED:
Added Dkk’s winzy cheater app, here’s what he’s got to say about it.

QUOTE
As of right now, it only does random web searching using a 2000+ wordlist. It’ll keep searching until you win a chance at a game. Also, it’s able to minimize into the systemtray. As stated before, I may update it so that it’s much better, but we’ll see. Check the ReadMe.txt for details.
